>
[Indestructible Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=322)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 588 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An _indestructible shield_ is a [high-grade adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=310) [shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 13, HP 90) that can withstand just about any damage. It can be damaged only by a [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) spell (roll damage as if against a creature that failed its save) or by an artifact tied to destruction, such as a [_sphere of annihilation_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=620).

**Craft Requirements** The raw materials must include at least 4,400 gp of adamantine.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
